sense.gloss: Yawata no Yabushirazu (bamboo grove in Chiba; impossible to find one's way out of according to popular legend)
thicket from which one cannot escape, maze
getting lost, being unable to find a way out

k_ele.e: 藪をつついて蛇を出す
薮をつついて蛇を出す

r_ele.r: やぶをつついてへびをだす

sense.gloss: to stir up trouble for oneself, to scare out a snake by poking at the bush
unnecessary trouble brought upon oneself, stirring up a hornet's nest
x: 藪をつついて蛇を出す

sense.gloss: out of the blue, all of a sudden, without warning, unexpectedly

sdata.j: お↑前↑↓まえ↓は↑首↑↓くび↓だ、と↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑藪↑↓やぶ↓から↑棒↑↓ぼう↓に↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑告↑↓つ↓げた。
sdata.e: He told me point-blank that I was fired.

sdata.j: ↑藪↑↓やぶ↓をつついてヘビを↑出↑↓だ↓す。
sdata.e: It's not good to wake a sleeping snake.

sdata.j: ↑世↑↓よ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓は↑藪↑↓やぶ↓↑医者↑↓いしゃ↓だらけ。
sdata.e: The world is full of incompetent doctors.

sdata.j: ↑手↑↓て↓の↑中↑↓なか↓の↑一↑↓いち↓↑羽↑↓わ↓の↑鳥↑↓とり↓は、↑藪↑↓やぶ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓の↑二↑↓に↓↑羽↑↓わ↓の↑価値↑↓かち↓がある。
sdata.e: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.

sdata.j: ↑手↑↓て↓の↑中↑↓なか↓の↑一↑↓いち↓↑羽↑↓わ↓の↑鳥↑↓とり↓は、↑藪↑↓やぶ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓の↑二↑↓に↓↑羽↑↓わ↓の↑価値↑↓かち↓がある。
sdata.e: A bird in the hand is better than two in the bush.

sdata.j: それは↑藪↑↓やぶ↓から↑棒↑↓ぼう↓だったね。
↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑母↑↓かあ↓さん、その↑医者↑↓いしゃ↓は↑藪↑↓やぶ↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓ってるんだ。
sdata.e: My mom thinks the doctor is a quack.

sdata.j: ↑手↑↓て↓の↑中↑↓なか↓の↑一↑↓いち↓↑羽↑↓わ↓の↑鳥↑↓とり↓は、↑藪↑↓やぶ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓の↑二↑↓に↓↑羽↑↓わ↓の↑価値↑↓かち↓がある。
sdata.e: A bird in hand is better than two in the bush.

words.gloss: Yawata no Yabushirazu (bamboo grove in Chiba; impossible to find one's way out of according to popular legend)
